title: As some U.S. evangelical churches defy stay-at-home directives, others switch to online services - The Globe and Mail
description: As some U.S. evangelical churches defy stay-at-home directives, others switch to online services The Globe and Mail Faithful mark Good Friday away from churches amid coronavirus concerns CBC.ca Coronavirus: Why some US churches are still open this Easter BBC …
content:
Pastor Tony Spell talks with journalists before attending Sunday service at the Life Tabernacle Church challenging state orders against assembling in large groups to prevent the spread of coronavirus disease in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, on April 5, 2020.
